page.title: 17ATTITUDES IN MAWNAN
page.content: Here are the results of our{interviews with over 120 people in the village. Most were either retired or housewifes therefore it wasn't a fair sample. Everyone was friendly and eager to answer questions only 3 refused. About half have lived here for over 20 years. Only one person didn't like living here, everyone else said it was a beautiful place to live and to retire to. Most people hope that it will be the same in the{future although they thought it would get bigger and join Falmouth. A few improvements noted were street lighting and wider roads. Nearly everyone liked gardening or a sport or walking as a spare time{activity}.80% of people said they were C of E, 4% Catholic and 16% Methodist. 57% said they didn't attend a{church}although many of these also they were C of E.
